messages.title: Fair pay for hard work
messages.content: People who play by the rules should be able to get ahead. But too often that isn't happening for Renfrewshire families.

messages.title: Giving local young people a chance to get on
messages.content: Labour will guarantee a job or training for every school leaver paid for by taking bankers' bonuses.

messages.title: Protect our NHS
messages.content: This year at the RAH patients have faced waiting times of over 12 hours and too many operations have been cancelled.

messages.title: Ban exploitative zero-hours contracts
messages.content: Labour will ban exploitative zero-hours contracts, making sure that anyone working regular hours has the right to a regular contract.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Scottish Labour will back hardworking people and raise the Minimum Wage to £8.
Labour plans to recruit more nurses for the RAH, paid for by a Mansion Tax on homes worth over £2 million, and a new £100 million fund to tackle the crises at A&E.
Labour will ban exploitative zero-hours contracts and ensure that regular workers have the right to a regular contract.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet suggests that voters need to stop the Tories from being the largest party and prevent further Tory government.

issues.education: Labour will guarantee a job or training for every school leaver paid for by taking bankers' bonuses.
issues.health: Labour's Douglas Alexander is campaigning to protect our NHS, including more nurses for the RAH and a new £100 million fund for A&E.

leaflet.personalStatement: I grew up here in Renfrewshire and I want what's best for local families. I went to our local schools and, like us all, rely on our NHS. I joined the Labour Party here in the 1980s after seeing my school friends’ parents lose their jobs when the Linwood car plant closed. It left me with a determination to fight against unemployment and poverty.

endorsements.endorsement: Douglas is a local man who grew up here, which is why he is so determined to fight for our community.
This election is a choice between either a Labour or Tory government. The Tories would introduce even more deep spending cuts.
I'm backing Douglas’ plan for more nurses and £1600 Future Fund so all my friends have a chance to get on.
As an NHS worker, I'm backing Douglas' plan for more nurses for the RAH.

quotes.text: Only Labour's Douglas Alexander can deliver the change we need.

images.caption: Images of Douglas Alexander interacting with constituents and holding a plan for action
